languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "Этот абсурд порядком затянулся... Хорошо, видит Император, я не хотел обращаться к своему опыту стажировки в Администратуме, но придется. Имеется ли у леди Моллес-Секандас документ, подтверждающий, что она жива? Если нет, ответчицу считать мертвой со всеми вытекающими".

{n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс устало потирает переносицу.{/n} "Этот абсурд порядком затянулся... Хорошо, видит Император, я не хотел обращаться к своему опыту стажировки в Администратуме, но придется. Имеется ли у леди Моллес-Секандас документ, подтверждающий, что она жива? Если нет, ответчицу считать мертвой со всеми вытекающими".

The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my experience as an Administratum intern, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich müde seinen Nasenrücken.{/n} "Diese Absurdität dauert schon zu lange ... So sei es. Der Imperator ist mein Zeuge. Ich kehre wirklich nur ungern an meine Arbeit im Administratum zurück, aber mir bleibt wohl nichts anderes übrig. Hat Lady Molles-Secundas ein Dokument, das belegt, dass sie am Leben ist? Falls nicht, ist die Angeklagte für tot zu erklären, mit allen rechtlichen Folgen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich müde seinen Nasenrücken.{/n} "Diese Absurdität dauert schon zu lange ... So sei es. Der Imperator ist mein Zeuge. Ich kehre wirklich nur ungern an meine Arbeit im Administratum zurück, aber mir bleibt wohl nichts anderes übrig. Hat Lady Molles-Secundas ein Dokument, das belegt, dass sie am Leben ist? Falls nicht, ist die Angeklagte für tot zu erklären, mit allen rechtlichen Folgen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « Cette absurdité n'a que trop duré. Enfin, puisqu'il faut en passer par là... L'Empereur sait que je n'ai aucune envie de revenir sur ma formation initiale au sein de l'Administratum, mais en l'occurrence, je n'ai pas le choix. Dame Molles-Secundas dispose-t-elle d'un document officiel certifiant qu'elle est en vie ? Dans le cas contraire, l'inculpée doit être considérée comme morte, avec toutes les conséquences qui en découlent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « Cette absurdité n'a que trop duré. Enfin, puisqu'il faut en passer par là... L'Empereur sait que je n'ai aucune envie de revenir sur ma formation initiale au sein de l'Administratum, mais en l'occurrence, je n'ai pas le choix. Dame Molles-Secundas dispose-t-elle d'un document officiel certifiant qu'elle est en vie ? Dans le cas contraire, l'inculpée doit être considérée comme morte, avec toutes les conséquences qui en découlent. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希揉了揉鼻梁，看起来疲惫不堪。{/n}“这场闹剧已经拖得太久了……好吧，帝皇在上，我真的很不愿意重温早年在帝国内政部的经历，但我现在别无选择。不知道莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人有没有任何法律文件能证明她还活着？如果没有的话，被告将被宣告死亡，同时承担所有相关责任。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希揉了揉鼻梁，看起来疲惫不堪。{/n}“这场闹剧已经拖得太久了……好吧，帝皇在上，我真的很不愿意重温早年在帝国内政部的经历，但我现在别无选择。不知道莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人有没有任何法律文件能证明她还活着？如果没有的话，被告将被宣告死亡，同时承担所有相关责任。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frota la nariz con aspecto cansado.{/n} «Esta ridiculez se ha alargado demasiado... Que así sea. Por el Emperador, le aseguro que no quiero recordar mi entrenamiento en el Administratum, pero debo hacerlo. ¿Tiene lady Molles-Secundas algún documento que certifique que ella misma está viva? Si no, la acusada debe considerarse fallecida, con todo lo que ello implica».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frota la nariz con aspecto cansado.{/n} «Esta ridiculez se ha alargado demasiado... Que así sea. Por el Emperador, le aseguro que no quiero recordar mi entrenamiento en el Administratum, pero debo hacerlo. ¿Tiene lady Molles-Secundas algún documento que certifique que ella misma está viva? Si no, la acusada debe considerarse fallecida, con todo lo que ello implica».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは疲れた様子で鼻の付け根をこすった。{/n}「この馬鹿げた状況が長引きすぎた…よかろう。かつての帝国行政局での初期訓練を思い出すのは気が進まんが、皇帝陛下を証人に、やらねばなるまい。レディ・モレス・セクンダスには、彼女が生存していることを証明する書類があるか？もしないのなら、被告は死亡したものと見なされ、それに伴うすべての処置が適用される」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. The Emperor as my witness, I am reluctant to revisit my early training experience in the Administratum, but I am going to have to. Does Lady Molles-Secundas have a paper that certifies she is alive? If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは疲れた様子で鼻の付け根をこすった。{/n}「この馬鹿げた状況が長引きすぎた…よかろう。かつての帝国行政局での初期訓練を思い出すのは気が進まんが、皇帝陛下を証人に、やらねばなるまい。レディ・モレス・セクンダスには、彼女が生存していることを証明する書類があるか？もしないのなら、被告は死亡したものと見なされ、それに伴うすべての処置が適用される」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, yorgunlukla burun kemerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Saçmalıkların ardı arkası kesilmiyor... Öyle olsun. İmparator şahidim ya, Administratum'daki eğitim günlerime hiç dönesim yok... Yine de mecburum. Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın sağ olduğuna dair bir belge var mıdır? Yoksa sanık, tüm gerekleriyle birlikte ölü kabul edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n} "This absurdity has dragged on for too long... So be it. If not, the defendant is to be deemed dead, with all that entails."
